TechStore

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product,products } from '../products'; import { CartService } from '../cart.service'; import { LikeServiceService } from '../like-service.service'; import { ProductListComponent } from '../product-list/product-list.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { product : Product |undefined; }
